```{r}
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyverse)
```



```{r}
read_csv("https://services.pca.state.mn.us/api/v1/groundwater/monitoring-stations?stationType=Well&format=csv") %>%
  filter(stationPurpose %in% c("Domestic Drinking", "Public Drinking"), sampleCount>0)
```

```{r}
river_lake_stream_data = read_csv("2010-2023_river_lake_stream.csv")

river_lake_stream_data <- river_lake_stream_data[-c(1:4),]

colnames(river_lake_stream_data) <- river_lake_stream_data[1,]
  
river_lake_stream_data <- river_lake_stream_data[-c(1),]

nms <- names(river_lake_stream_data)
names(river_lake_stream_data)[nms == 'NA'] <- paste0('Poop',1:4)

small <- river_lake_stream_data %>%
  group_by(STATION_ID) %>%
  slice_head()


ggplot(small, aes(x = Poop3, y= Poop4)) +
  geom_point()
  
```
